cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_1: 这是一个样板编码终端
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_10: 如果你的网络中没有钻石镐, 则会在右下角显示“合成”, 按“鼠标中键”或“鼠标左键”可以合成一些
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_11: 如果你的网络中已有钻石镐, 则会在右下角显示数字, 按“鼠标中键”可以再合成一些
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_12: 若你的网络中有很多复杂的ME样板供应器
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_13: 你可以使用“ME样板管理终端”来管理网络中的所有样板
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_4: 假如你要自动化合成钻石镐
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_8: 我们将其取走, 放入紧贴“分子装配室”的“ME样板供应器”
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui.text_9: 然后我们可以找到钻石镐的图标
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.header: 自动化配置案例——“燃料”类配方
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_1: 这是一个配置好的用于熔炉将生鸡肉制作熟鸡肉的样板
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_11: 正常的ME接口有2排9列物品栏
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_12: 但是“俺寻思”里面并不能放不下这么多, 此处省略()
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_13: 在此处标记 1 个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_14: ME接口会自动从网络抽取物品, 使其与设定的数量保持一致
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_15: 假如此时网络共有 8 组(64x8=512)个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_16: ME接口将抽取 1 个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_17: 随后, 漏斗会将煤炭抽取走, ME接口内煤炭耗尽
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_18: ME接口将重新抽取 1 个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_19: 如此循环往复, 直到熔炉、漏斗、ME接口中都被填满, ME接口将停止抽取新的物品
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_20: 最后, 网络中剩余512-5x64-1x64-1=127个煤炭(填充熔炉一组, 填充漏斗5组, 填充ME接口1个)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_21: 此时, 在终端中合成一个熟鸡肉
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_22: 样板供应器向网络请求了一个生鸡肉
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_23: 生鸡肉通过漏斗来到熔炉
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_24: 熔炉开始工作并消耗 1 个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_26: 煤炭被消耗, ME接口重新请求 1 个煤炭
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_29: 熟鸡肉通过漏斗回到下面的ME接口, 回到网络, 结束合成
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_30: 这种把“消耗品”与“原料”分开的思路仍可在其他地方使用, 比如...
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_31: 注液器(熔岩蛋糕自动化)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_32: 烈焰人燃烧室(自动加热但是超级费燃料!)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_33: 冶金灌注机(自动填充灌注类型)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_34: 化学机器(自动填充气体或液体)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_4: 且有着相对严格的输入输出分配
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_5: 即只能侧面输入燃料, 顶部输入物品, 底部输出物品
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_6: 我们可以将其拆解成两部分：
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_8: 由样板供应器来提供原料(生鸡肉)
cmi.ponder.ae2_gui2.text_9: 由ME接口来提供燃料(煤炭)
cmi.ponder.cardboard_box.text_1: Containers can be used for the transfer of block
cmi.ponder.cardboard_box.text_2: Next we will demonstrate an example
cmi.ponder.cardboard_box.text_6: Next you can dig up the container and take it anywhere
cmi.ponder.cardboard_box.text_7: Sneaking + R-Click to remove the container
cmi.ponder.cardboard_box.text_9: There is also a part of Block(s) that cannot be wrapped in containers
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_1: Faucet is a special kind of logistics item
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_2: It can transfer fluid from the block it is attached to to the block below it
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_3: It can transfer the fluid in the container
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_4: The water within the water-containing block
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_5: Even the fluid in the world!
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_6: You can R-Click it to turn the output on or off
cmi.ponder.faucet.text_7: You can also use it to transport items in containers! However, the transportation efficiency of this method is not very high, but it is very useful in some special occasions!
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_1: 使用裂变反应堆外壳搭建一个长3~18格、宽3~18格、高4~18格的长方体框架
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_2: 再用强化玻璃或裂变反应堆外壳填满多面体的每一个面
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_3: 把部分面上的外壳替换为裂变反应堆端口
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_4: 潜行时使用配置器右键端口更改输入/输出模式
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_5: 在反应堆内部垂直放入裂变燃料组件
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_6: 再在其上方放置控制棒组件
cmi.ponder.fission_reactor.text_7: 你也可以通过裂变反应堆逻辑适配器自动控制反应堆
cmi.ponder.melter.text_1: To use Melter, you need to place an Heater first
cmi.ponder.melter.text_2: Then place an Heater above the Melter
cmi.ponder.melter.text_3: Then place Ceared Table and Seared Basin on any two sides of Heater
cmi.ponder.melter.text_4: Then place Faucet on any two sides of Melter
cmi.ponder.melter.text_5: Then you need to add fuels to Heater
cmi.ponder.melter.text_6: After adding fuels, you can add items to be smelted in Melter
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_2: Portals are all set up based on a Controller
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_3: The Controller must be at the centre of the bottom side
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_4: The inner space of the Portal must be at least 3x3
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_6: Provide FE energy to the Controller and link another Portal in GUI
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_7: Portals support item, fluid and energy transmission
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_8: Modules that recieves transmission should be set to Output Mode in GUI
cmi.ponder.portal_controller.text_9: Activate interDimentional transmission of a Portal with an Interdimentional Modual
cmi.ponder.scorched.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
Rectangular Scorched Bricks composition
cmi.ponder.scorched.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Foundry Controller
Fuel Tank
Scorched Drain
cmi.ponder.scorched.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
cmi.ponder.scorched.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
cmi.ponder.scorched.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
cmi.ponder.smeltery.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
Rectangular Seared Bricks composition
cmi.ponder.smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Fuel Tank
Smeltery Controller
Seared Drain
cmi.ponder.smeltery.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
cmi.ponder.smeltery.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
cmi.ponder.smeltery.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
cmi.ponder.the_accelerator_of_mechanism_: R-Click it with an iron mechanism in hand...
...and the stone around it changes into ore!
The accelerator also supports other mechanisms
But attention, only blocks in 5x5 zone around it can be transformed!
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_1: This is an ordinary thermal machine
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_10: Click here to view all recipes
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_2: When we R-Click it, an interface ui up
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_3: Here is an energy tank for storing redstone flux RF (electrical energy)
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_4: Put the battery in here can also supply power
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui.text_9: When the progress bar is completed, the input items will be consumed and then output
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_1: This is a thermal machine with a trough of items only.
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_10: It is worth mentioning that this setting is applicable in most Mods
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_12: The machine will automatically extract items
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_15: Press Shift to click on the front to reset the settings
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_16: The front face of the thermal machine cannot interact
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_17: Use the redprint to copy the configuration to expand the grand plan for your machinery.
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_2: Click here to open the configuration page
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_3: Power the machine from any side
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_4: Turn on automatic input and output here.
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_5: and set the input and output of each face
cmi.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_8: The hybrid represents both input and output
cmi.ponder.usage.text_3: You can either use GUI or automation input
cmi.ponder.usage.text_4: Ingredients can also insert into crucible on the top
cmi.ponder.usage.text_5: Coke coal can insert to the burners
cmi.ponder.usage.text_6: Products can be extracted from sides of the crucible part
cmi.ponder.water_pump.text_1: If you want to use the water pump
cmi.ponder.water_pump.text_2: You need to build a complete structure first
cmi.ponder.water_pump.text_4: Finally, put on the machine body
cmi.ponder.water_pump.text_5: After the structure is built, the pipeline can be used to pump water
ae2.ponder.cable.text_1: Except the thick and thin cables
ae2.ponder.cable.text_2: There are 3 more types of cable bus in AE2
ae2.ponder.cable.text_3: Quartz fiber can transmit energy between ME networks without impacting channels
ae2.ponder.cable.text_4: Toggle Bus and Inverted Toggle Bus can switch connection of devices to ME system
ae2.ponder.cable.text_5: Now the device above is online while the device below is offline
ae2.ponder.cable.text_6: If a redstone signal comes here...
ae2.ponder.cable.text_7: Now the device below is online while the device above is offline
ae2.ponder.channel.text_1: Channels are essential to ME Networks
ae2.ponder.channel.text_3: While thin cables transmit only 8 channels
ae2.ponder.channel.text_5: No more channels can go through this cable
ae2.ponder.channel.text_6: This may cause some devices go offline
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_1: Condenser is a device to consume extra stuffs/fluids and create new items
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_2: In most cases, it is suggested to pump water into the condenser
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_3: As it is mostly used to create matter balls and singularities
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_4: A condenser needs a cell component to function
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_5: Switch the condenser to related mode to create matter balls and singularities
ae2.ponder.controller.text_2: It provides energy source and info transmission of the ME system
ae2.ponder.controller.text_3: By storing AE energy and providing channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_4: The controller should be powered to work
ae2.ponder.controller.text_5: Every side of a single ME controller block provides at most 32 channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_6: ME controllers could be connected to provide more channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_7: AE devices can be placed besides the controller or connected with cables
ae2.ponder.controller.text_9: While thin cables transmit only 8 channels
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_1: As just presented, Me networks need a Crafting CPU to automize recipes
It's best to build multiple small CPUs for those who will make frequent simple crafting requests
While for those who want to enjoy automating an entire complex recipe, a large CPU is better choice
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_2: Crafting CPU consists of 8 types of blocks divided into 4 groups
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_3: Crafting Unit is the basic material of Crafting CPUs, while they're also user to fill extra space of CPUs
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_4: 5 types of Crafting Storage provides computing ability and stores incomplete results
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_5: But Crafting CPUs with only Crafting Storage is a single-thread core
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_6: While every Crafting Accelerator provides one more thread to the CPU
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_7: Crafting Monitor has a screen on it, showing what recipe the CPU is processing
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_8: These blocks must be placed as a rectangle to form and work
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_9: One Crafting CPU can only process one crafting request from terminal
ae2.ponder.drive.text_2: It provides storage space for the ME system
ae2.ponder.drive.text_3: Place Storage Cells into the drive to provide storage space
ae2.ponder.drive.text_4: ME Drives should be connected to ME network to function
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_1: Patterns in the Pattern Provider only detects the input and output of the recipe
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_10: Set the Pattern Provider to up direction with a wrench
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_11: And place the ME Interface right onto the Pattern Provider
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_12: Use a Quartz Fiber to gain energy from the Main Network
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_13: Use a Storage Bus to input things from the main net into the furnace
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_14: The Storage Bus on the side set filter as fuels only
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_15: While the one on top set filter as no fuels with an Inverter Card
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_16: And finally suck the result back into the Pattern Provider with a Hopper
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_2: As a consequence, it's free to edit any type of recipy, almost all recipes in this modpack
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_4: It has a high requirement of input and output direction
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_5: Materials can only be put in from the top
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_6: Fuels can only be put in from side
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_7: Results can only be suck out from the bottom
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_8: So the only 1 output from the Pattern Provider should be seperated into output in 2 directions
ae2.ponder.furnace_automation.text_9: Where Sub-Network would be extremerly useful
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_1: Me P2P Tunnels are devices to transmit channels via another ME network
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_10: Rightclick the tunnel with an Energy Call or an Energy Acceptor to transform it into an Energy P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_11: Rightclick the tunnel with a Glowstone to transform it into a Light P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_2: P2P stands for Point to Point, edges of P2P Tunnels shows no difference from direct connection
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_3: P2P Tunnels need to set connections with a Memory Card
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_4: And now channels can go through P2P Tunnels!
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_5: P2P tunnel provides only one-way transmission, but it supports multiple outputs
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_6: But attention! Every one of P2P Tunnel will consume 1 channel!
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_7: Rightclick the tunnel with a Redstone or a Redstone Block to transform it into a Redstone P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_8: Rightclick the tunnel with a Chest or a Hopper to transform it into an Item P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_9: Rightclick the tunnel with a fluid bucket to transform it into a Fluid P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_1: Throw the singularity onto the ground with an ender pearl or an ender dust
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_2: Blow them up with a TNT or a tiny tnt
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_3: And here is a pair of Quantum Entangled Singularity(QES)!
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_4: Pairs of QESs can be put into pairs of Quantum Rings
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_5: Only the Quantum Rings right beside the Quantum Link can transmit channels
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_6: And now this ME Drive is connected
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_7: To the ME Network of this ME Controller
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_8: Quantum Ring support inter-dimentional channel transmission, which means it can be used for the transportation between dimentions
ae2.ponder.simple_crafting_automation.te: While this is a Pattern Provider
Connect them into a ME network with a Molecular Assembler
And this is a most simple Crafting Automation Network
Create a Pattern with a Pattern Encoding Terminal, for example, 2 Andesite Alloy => 8 Shaft
And plug it into the Pattern Provider
And the terminal will show support of Shaft crafting, order them whenever they are needed
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_1: Spatial Pylons and Spatial IO Port are devices on spatial storage and transportation
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_10: Spatial Storage is extremely powerful, you can even transport End Portal with it!
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_2: Spatial Pylons must be placed in rows and columns, connect each row or column with Cables
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_3: Build a rectangle with Spatial Pylons to select a zone in world
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_4: And connect a Spatial IO Port to the ME network
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_5: Ensure all Spatial Pylons are inside the green rectangle while outside the purple
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_6: Name of the Spatial Storage Cell marks its maximum storage space
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_7: Put a Spatial Storage Cell into the Spatial IO Port
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_9: Inputing Spatial Storage Cells with stored space will release the space
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_1: This is a Wireless Access Point
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_2: It allows users to get access to the ME network remotely
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_3: Well, with an ME Wireless Terminal in hand
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_4: By default, the Wireless Access Point provides access from 16 blocks away
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_5: Plug in Wireless Boosters to increase access distance
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_6: By maximum it provides 528 blocks of distant access with a set of Wireless Booster
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_7: If a Quantum Ring has already been built
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_8: Plug a Quantum Bridge Card and a Quantum Entangled Singularity into a Wireless Universal Terminal
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_9: To gain access of infinity distance and inter-dimentions
